org.sd.extract
Class ExtractionPipeline

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.extract.ExtractionPipeline
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextFileExtractionPipeline, XmlExtractionPipeline
public abstract class ExtractionPipeline
extends java.lang.Object

A "mega extractor" to apply multiple regular extractors to a document (text container).

Author:
Spence Koehler

Constructor Detail

ExtractionPipeline

public ExtractionPipeline()
Default constructor.

Created text containers will keep (cache) doc texts only if one of the added extractors needs the doc text cache.

ExtractionPipeline

public ExtractionPipeline(boolean keepDocTexts,
                          boolean keepEmpties)
Construct forcing created text containers to keep (cache) doc texts.

buildDefaultHtmlPipeline

public static final ExtractionPipeline buildDefaultHtmlPipeline(boolean extractHeadings,
                                                                boolean keepDocTexts,
                                                                boolean keepEmpties,
                                                                Extractor[] extractors)
Convenience method to build a default pipeline over html data.

Parameters:
extractHeadings - If true, a default HeadingExtractor will be added.
keepDocTexts - Set to true if will use extrapolation or other text container access.
extractors - Extractors to add. Okay if null.
Returns:
a new extraction pipeline.

                                                                    Extractor[] extractors)

                                                                boolean keepEmpties,
                                                                java.util.List<Extractor> extractors)
Convenience method to build a default pipeline over html data.

Parameters:
extractHeadings - If true, a default HeadingExtractor will be added.
keepDocTexts - Set to true if will use extrapolation or other text container access.
extractors - Extractors to add. Okay if null.

a new extraction pipeline.

Add the given extractors to this pipeline.

Parameters:

runExtractors

public TextContainer runExtractors(java.io.File file,
                                   java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean die,
                                   boolean turnOffCaching)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Run the pipelined extractors over the given text container, storing the results within.

The resultant text container will be iterated up to the point where all extractors are finished with its document.

NOTE: It is the responsibility of the caller of this method to close non-null returned text containers.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

runExtractors

public TextContainer runExtractors(java.lang.String streamId,
                                   java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                   java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean die,
                                   boolean turnOffCaching)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Run the pipelined extractors over the given text container, storing the results within.

The resultant text container will be iterated up to the point where all extractors are finished with its document.

NOTE: It is the responsibility of the caller of this method to close non-null returned text containers.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
